item.title: Preventive Traditional Chinese Herbal Supplements
item.author: xxxxx@gmail.com (Dao of Healing)
item.description: Today, after overcoming all kinds of obstacles, conquering all kinds of difficulties, and taking all kinds of risks, Dr. Yang and his team decided to post this Traditional Chinese Herbal Supplements (TCM) prescription here in hopes of helping more people in prevention: Herb Name in Chinese Spelling****English Name DosageGui Zhi Cassia Twig8gBai Shao White Paeony Root8gSheng JiangGinger8gDa ZaoDates6gZhi Gan CaoPrepared Liquorice Root6g For healthy adults, take this prescription twice a day for 7 days; for adults of poor health, take this prescription twice a day for 10-14 days.
item.dc:creator: Dao of Healing
